fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Shroud**: You cannot die during night the night you use this, and all guesses against you will fail(2 uses)
**Dangerous Prowess**: Healing aura deals a basic tonight instead of healing(2 uses)
**Calling**: Gain a special card of your choosing. You cannot take the same card twice using this effect(2 uses, 3 night cooldown)
**Heavens Help**: Select a dead player; gain one HP. You may not select the same player twice.
Attributues:
**Afterlife's Debt**: If somebody publicly says [I guess X as the shaman], X being a player, and they were correct, you die.
**Shamans Revenge**: If somebody is incorrect about a guess, they die. This resolves immediately, and all actions and words spoken after this are null and void.
**Healing aura**: Heal the two players next to you.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all Town, Florae, Sentries, City, Army, Mainframe, Everything, Neutral Killings and opposing evil Factions. You may spare all Crew, Neutral Benigns, Chaos and Evils however.
